metadata.title: CVE-2015-0275 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The ext4_zero_range function in fs/ext4/extents.c in the Linux kernelbefore 4.1 allows local users to cause a denial of service (BUG) via acrafted fallocate zero-range request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
